full_summary:
### Title: Fire Alarm and Sensor Monitoring for Facilities in Saskatchewan

#### Reference Number: M5000-23-00507/C
#### Publication Date: April 12, 2024

**Overview**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites Bidders to submit proposals for the supply and delivery of Fire Alarm and Sensor Monitoring Services and Fire Alarm Panel Inspection Services for multiple locations in Saskatchewan. This contract period will span two years, with an optional extension for up to three additional one-year periods.

**Eligibility**

To be considered, Bidders must comply with the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal and demonstrate their qualifications as an Indigenous business, as defined by the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. The RCMP reserves the right to limit the competition to qualified Indigenous businesses.

**Security Requirements**

This solicitation includes a security requirement. Interested Bidders must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria, as outlined in the Bid Solicitation.

#### Key Details

* **Contract Period**: Two years, with optional extension for up to three one-year periods
* **Eligibility**: Indigenous Business, as defined by the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business
* **Security Requirements**: Mandatory technical evaluation criteria
* **Competition**: Limited to qualified Indigenous businesses

#### Tenders

Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per the Request for Proposal. Interested Bidders may obtain further information from the attached documents.

**Government Wide Policies and Procedures**

This procurement is subject to the following Government Wide Policies and Procedures:

* Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada
* Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business
* Canadian Trade Agreements

## Additional Resources

* Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities
* Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business: www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory
* Federal Indigenous Business Directory: www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries or clarification, please contact:

* Shawn Balaski, RCMP Procurement Representative
* Phone: (780) 670-8592
* Email: [shawn.m.balaski@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:shawn.m.balaski@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
